output_list.reason: The 'transfer' function does not check for overflow when updating the balance of the 'to' address, allowing users to overflow the balance of any account and arbitrarily set it to zero.
The 'transferFrom' function does not check for overflow when updating the balance of the 'to' address, allowing users to overflow the balance of any account and arbitrarily set it to zero.
The '_buy' function does not check for overflow when updating the balance of the caller, allowing users to overflow the balance of any account and arbitrarily set it to zero.
The '_sell' function does not check for overflow when updating the balance of the caller, allowing users to overflow the balance of any account and arbitrarily set it to zero.
The 'transferOwnership' function does not check if the caller is the owner, allowing any user to transfer ownership of the contract to any address.
